snippet.title: Block Buster Billy announce trailer
snippet.description: Block Buster Billy is a puzzle game where you move around blocks with numbers and mathematical symbols to form equations. Once the equation is correct, you can move it as a single block to solve the puzzle. https://store.steampowered.com/app/2063850/Block_Buster_Billy/
